description: The PV2 segment is a continuation of visit specific information contained on the PV1 segment.

1.name: Prior Pending Location
1.description: required only for Cancel Pending Transfer (A27) messages
1.data_type: CM_INTERNAL_LOCATION - Cm For Location Information In Hospital

2.name: Accommodation Code
2.description: indicates the specific patient accommodations for this visit. Refer to user-defined table 0129 - accommodation code

3.name: Admit Reason
3.description: short description the patient admission reason

4.name: Transfer Reason
4.description: short description of the patient location change reason

5.name: Patient Valuables
5.description: short description of patient valuables checked in during admission

6.name: Patient Valuables Location
6.description: indicates the location of the patient's valuables

7.name: Visit User Code
7.description: further categorizes a patient's visit with respect to an individual institution's needs (e.g., teaching flag = TE, indicating the patient is a teaching case). Refer to user-defined table 0130 - visit user code

8.name: Expected Admit Date
8.description: date patient expected to be admitted

9.name: Expected Discharge Date
9.description: non-event related date used by ancillaries to more accurately determine projected workloads
